WorkItem.Description:
Hello, I have epic gems in some slots, and when "Equipping" custom gems, these show in the filter list, however, in other slots, when wanting to filter to the new epic gems to try and get the maximum performance out of my character, they just don't show, hoping you guys can help!
Â 
Thanks, Kris
WorkItem.Summary: Epic gems added in 3.2 aren't showing properly

Comments.Message: Make sure you don't have anything filtered out in the Filters dropdown in the top right. Also, see Tools > Gemming Templates, and make sure you have the Epic checkbox checked.
